content:
Hi All,
i was working on implementing messages with FHIR and while working with message header i see that there is reference table given for events but no FHIR event is specified in the same. can anyone once help me with list of message events ?
current valueset link on FHIR site : http://hl7.org/fhir/valueset-message-events.html
That's up to a project/IG to define. As of right now HL7 hasn't defined any events (other than a couple of examples).
